title: Bergdorf Goodman bag - handwritten
content:
Hello all,  
I am looking for a font similar to this writing on a 2012 Bergdorf Goodman shopping bag. This looks handwritten to me, but I would be so grateful if anyone could point me in the direction of a similar looking script, and if possible where to purchase/download it.

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [bergdorf1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420024952/http:/typophile.com/files/bergdorf1.jpg) | 102.29 KB |
| [bergdorf2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420024952/http:/typophile.com/files/bergdorf2.jpg) | 49.86 KB |
author: katiber

comments.content:
hm. well, in my (limited) experience the handwritten look fonts tend to be what some might call low-end. however, you can find some similars:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420024952im_/http:/typophile.com/files/snap_6381.png)
  
 [http://www.ffonts.net/MoiNonPlus.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420024952/http:/www.ffonts.net/MoiNonPlus.font "http://www.ffonts.net/MoiNonPlus.font")

there are many, it appears, by Softmaker  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/softmaker/claude-handwriting/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420024952/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/softmaker/claude-handwriting/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/softmaker/claude-handwriting/")
it looks like the second one is hand written -- duplicate letters are different (a,p,y).

You might like some of Emily's fonts:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/person/Emily\_Conners/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420024952/http:/www.myfonts.com/person/Emily_Conners/ "http://www.myfonts.com/person/Emily\_Conners/")
